title: How do i disable chat filter?

replies.body:
If those settings just refuse to update, we could try doing a 'manual' reset completely. Follow these steps and you should be able to get those fully reset.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
